duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform services not provided by a subcontractor and ensure installations are completed per Pella Manufacturing Installation Instructions.
Assess quality of sub-contracted installations and give feedback to management as needed.
Assist with initial sub-contractor sourcing and assimilation of subcontractors.
Communicate effectively with customers and serve as a reputable Pella representative on all jobsites.
Responsible for the timely execution of the Order Verification process and setting realistic expectations with homeowners.
Perform job site inspection to assess home for water intrusion, rot, mold, and other issues.
Ensure seamless order fulfillment and cost containment working with both the sales team and installers.
Deliver missing items needed for installations to job sites to increase first-time completion rate as needed.
Provide training as needed to Retail Sales Consultants.
Perform installation recovery work following installations.
Maintain assigned vehicle and use, maintain, and store company-provided tools appropriately.
Meet company safety requirements and report any safety issues to the manager.
Product installation of non-cost-effective jobs not accepted by 3rd party subcontractors are assigned based on install skill set.
